name: InfiltratorTD
description:
Top Down shooter/tower defence game with steam multiplayer compatibility

To play this game multiplayer just click host session whilst signed into steam. then your friends should be able to find your game in the server browser when they click join.

This tower defence game currently has 6 different tower types (Each tower has 3 levels of upgrades) and 4 different enemy types. most assets are made by myself apart from the player models and animations and the sounds

Programmed using Unreal engine 4 C++ majority and some blueprint
